title: Mafia 2: Digital Deluxe Edition v.1.0.0.1
body:
Mafia 2: Digital Deluxe Edition v.1.0.0.1


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Driving, Third-person, 3D
Companies: 2K Czech / 2K Games
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 8 GB
Repack Size: from 4 GB [Selective Dowload]

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent [magnet] [.torrent file only] (MULTI8)
  • RuTor [magnet] (ENG/RUS)
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] (ENG/RUS)
  • FreeTorrents (ENG/RUS)
  • Filehoster: MegaUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) (MULTI8)
  • Filehoster: FileCorn (Uploaded by Sabco, interchangeable, compatible with MegaUpload mirrors) (MULTI8)
  • Filehoster: 5 hosters (Uploaded by Susch, interchangeable, NOT compatible with MegaUpload or FileCorn mirrors) (MULTI8)

Fixed installer: http://www99.zippyshare.com/v/6Omxs1nj/file.html
Download only if you’re installing the game w/o English language and chose to install bonus files. Nothing else has changed.

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Mafia.II.MULTi8-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-mafia.ii.iso (9,248,210,944 bytes)
  • All DLCs and bonus content included, game version is v1.0.0.1
  • Exclusive FitGirl “DLC” 🙂 83 hi-resolution pinup pictures, converted from hidden game resources
  • 100% Lossless & 99% MD5 Perfect: almost all files are identical to originals after installation, but ~80 MB of encrypted DLC files were decrypted for better recompression. But their compression was left intact
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading of unnecessary languages and bonus content
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 8.6 to 4/4.1 GB for any single language)
  • Installation takes 25-50 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 11 GB
  • Use “language.changer.exe” in game root to change the game language

Game Description

Vito Scaletta has started to make a name for himself on the streets of Empire Bay as someone who can be trusted to get a job done. Together with his buddy Joe, he is working to prove himself to the Mafia, quickly escalating up the family ladder with crimes of larger reward, status and consequence… the life as a wise guy isn’t quite as untouchable as it seems.

Digital Deluxe Edition Content

  • Made Man Pack: Free access to in-game downloadable pack that lets players get behind the wheel of two different luxury automobiles modeled after classic cars from the period. In addition, Vito will look the part with two new “made man” suits, including a vintage tux.
  • Digital Art Book: Get to know the families of Empire Bay with a photo album-style Digital art book that takes fans through the artistic design process of the game.
  • Orchestral Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in Empire Bay’s symphonic masterpiece with the Mafia II score recorded by the Prague FILMHarmonic Orchestra.
  • Digital Map of Empire Bay: Get familiar with the neighborhoods and own the streets with the Digital map depicting the 10 square miles of Empire Bay and all the hangout spots.
  • Mafia II DLC: Betrayal of Jimmy
  • Mafia II DLC: Greaser Pack
  • Mafia II DLC: Jimmy’s Vendetta
  • Mafia II DLC: Joe’s Adventure
  • Mafia II DLC: Renegade Pack
  • Mafia II DLC: Vegas Pack
  • Mafia II DLC: War Hero Pack
  • Mafia II Exclusive FitGirl “DLC” 🙂 83 hi-resolution pinup pictures, converted from hidden game resources
